ygData.msgSnippet: so far i have seen a couple at the shops... only 1 or 2 have subtitles... (dvd)... n they are sooooooooooo expensive... ghost in the nutshell... final
ygData.messageBody:
so far i have seen a couple at the shops... only 1 or 2 have subtitles... (dvd)... n they are sooooooooooo expensive... ghost in the nutshell... final version... cost like 10,000 yen... thast more than 100 sing dollars... think if u order from states will be cheaper...
